label: associatedStandard
comment: A referenced standard associated to this specified licence.
A referenced standard associated with this production process.
A referenced standard associated with this specified declaration.
A referenced standard associated with this supply chain trade transaction.

rangeIncludes.comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.

domainIncludes.comment: A permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or to conduct a trade.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a self-declaration.
A group of supply chain trade line items, trade agreement, trade delivery and trade settlement details.
